name: videomeet
description: A professional video conferencing website with chat functionality built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Express

scripts.setup: node -e "console.log('Setting up VideoMeet...'); console.log('Copy all HTML files to views/ folder'); console.log('Copy all CSS files to public/css/ folder'); console.log('Copy all JS files to public/js/ folder'); console.log('Run: npm install'); console.log('Run: npm start');"
scripts.check: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const requiredFiles = ['server.js', 'views/index.html', 'views/landing.html', 'views/meeting.html', 'views/join.html', 'public/css/style.css', 'public/css/login.css', 'public/css/meeting.css', 'public/js/auth.js', 'public/js/landing.js', 'public/js/meeting.js', 'public/js/chat.js', 'public/js/join.js']; console.log('Checking required files...'); let missing = []; requiredFiles.forEach(file => { if (!fs.existsSync(file)) { missing.push(file); } }); if (missing.length === 0) { console.log('✓ All files are present'); } else { console.log('✗ Missing files:', missing); }"

author: VideoMeet Team
